pages.text: Call 843-972-8683 Parties Order Delivery Bienvenidos :: Welcome :: From Los Altos of Jalisco Mexico to Daniel Island, VIVA is a proud, family owned taco kitchen + tequilera from a team with over 35 years of restaurant experience. VIVA offers a new take on traditional Mexican food, in a beautiful and elevated atmosphere where guests can discover something new multiple times a week. We pride ourselves on craft, handmade margaritas made with fresh juices and 100% blue agave tequila and our bar has over 100 tequilas, mezcals, and sotol for our guests to explore. 864 Island Park Dr. | Suite #105 | Charleston, SC 29492 843-972-8683 Menus Serving Lunch at 11am & Dinner at 4pm.Serving Brunch Saturdays + Sundays 11am – 2pmView our current menus below: DinnerMenu See more See more Gift Cards A VIVA gift card is the perfect gift for margarita lovers and Latin-flavor followers. From work day lunches to weekend cocktails on the patio, there’s no shortage of excuses to enjoy VIVA! Available in store. Private Parties VIVA Event Space Available for private parties Sunday through Thursday, our upstairs veranda area is perfect for birthday parties, corporate functions or any event requiring a dedicated private space. Whether you prefer a buffet style meal, a multi-course meal, or to simply order off the regular menu individually, VIVA can accomodate you. Additionally, our private event space has its own bar so we can mix up our craft margaritas quickly & easily! Contact us to today to book your next event at VIVA. Reserve Follow Facebook Follow Us Follow Instagram 864 Island Park Dr. | Suite #105Charleston, SC 29492 843-972-8683 vivatacostequila@gmail.com Hours Sunday-Thursday | 11am-10pmFriday-Saturday | 11am-11pm Now Hiring Copyright 2021 Viva Tacos & Tequila Branding and Website by 12pt Creative
